sentences.en: Ellie: Manny, you cant pick favorites with your kids!
sentences.cn: 艾丽: 曼尼, 不能对孩子们挑三拣四!

sentences.en: Got a flame in my heart, cant get my fill.
sentences.cn: 有火焰在我心中, 我的斜面得到填补.

sentences.en: I can't believe the cant about this religion or that religion.
sentences.cn: 我不信这个宗教或那个宗教的口头禅.

sentences.en: I cant conceal it, dont you see, cant you feel it?
sentences.cn: 我斜面遮掩, 不该你看, 斜面你觉得 呢 ?

sentences.en: I cant do my homework and I cant look straight.
sentences.cn: 作业我没法专心做;上课我没法注意听.

sentences.en: I cant tell why this heart languishes in silence.
sentences.cn: 我不知道,为什麽这颗心在寂静中憔悴.
我不能容忍爱生闷气的人.

sentences.en: Im just ignorant, you cant say that am stupid.
sentences.cn: 翻译我只是无知, 你不能因此说我笨.

sentences.en: It'seems i always cant mix up with the tech.
sentences.cn: 好似我永远唔可以同理科混为一谈.

sentences.en: Sheep was a cant word of the time for a spy, under the gaolers.
sentences.cn: “绵羊”是那时牢房里的黑话, 意思是由典狱长控制的密探.

sentences.en: That cant about cures were never got up by sound practitioners.
sentences.cn: 那种左道旁门的医术,脚踏实地的医师是从来不屑一顾的.

sentences.en: The Prefect was fond of the cant of diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 这位警察局长很爱好外交辞令.

sentences.en: The ship took on a dangerous cant to port.
sentences.cn: 船只出现向左舷危险倾斜.

sentences.en: There has been a great deal of politician's cant.
sentences.cn: 说了一大堆政客惯用的言不由衷的话.

words.tran_cn: 倾斜（cant的过去式及过去分词）
行话的；哀诉声的；假仁假义的
斜面；伪善之言；黑话；角落
把…棱角去掉；使…倾斜；甩掉

trans.tran_cn: 行话的；哀诉声的；假仁假义的
倾斜，（下层社会的）黑话，斜面，言不由衷的话
trans.tran_en: insincere talk about moral or religious principles by someone who is pretending to be better than they really are
to lean, or make something lean

trans.tran_cn: 斜穿，使用黑话（或行话等），说言不由衷的话
使具有斜面，使倾斜，将…斜掷出去，猛扔
